bike.description: FACT 11m carbon, 29" geometry, tapered HT, carbon PF30 BB, hollow carbon dropouts, replaceable alloy rear derailleur hanger

components.description: Custom RockShox SID World Cup 29 Brain, inertia valve damper, Solo air spring, tapered carbon crown/steerer, top-mount Brain Fade and rebound adj., QR, 15.5": 80mm, 17.5/19/21": 90mm travel
1-1/8 and 1-1/2" threadless, Campy style upper with 1-1/2" lower, cartridge bearings
Specialized 7050 hard anodized alloy, 32.6mm, single bolt
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
